resources.string:
Thank you for using Budget Manager.

 Data Storage
 All data you enter into this application, including your income, expenses, categories, and notes, is stored exclusively in a private, local folder on your phone. This data does not leave your device and is not uploaded to any external server.

 Data Privacy
 We respect your privacy. We do not collect, share, or sell any of your personal or financial data to any third parties. Since all data is stored locally, you have full control over it.

 Permissions
 The application may request storage permissions solely for the purpose of exporting or importing your budget data as a CSV file to and from your phone's public 'Downloads' folder. This action is initiated entirely by you.

 If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us.
